column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday January 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Access to I-75 between Exits 115 (Newtown Pike) and 104 (Athens Boonesboro) is reporteldy shutdown.
Traffic already on I-75 will be allowed to continue, but once exited, traffic will not be allowed back on.
This will allow state highway crews time and space to work.

column3: I-64W between 101 - 104 MM's in Clark Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown due to a collision involving numerous vehicles.
